doctor.name: Dr. A.F.M Mahbub Alam
doctor.info: Dr. A.F.M Mahbub Alam is a Rheumatologist in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Rheumatology). He is a Assistant Professor, Rheumatology at Mugda Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. A.F.M Mahbub Alam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 5pm to 8pm (Sun & Tuesday).
